sections.transliteration: mano buddhi ahankara chittani naaham
sections.translation: I am not the mind, the intellect, the ego or the memory,

sections.transliteration: na cha shrotravjihve na cha ghraana netre
sections.translation: I am not the ears, the skin, the nose or the eyes,

sections.transliteration: na cha vyoma bhumir na tejo na vaayuhu
sections.translation: I am not space, not earth, not fire, water or wind,

sections.transliteration: chidananda rupah shivo'ham shivo'ham
sections.translation: I am the form of consciousness and bliss, I am Shiva

sections.transliteration: na cha prana sangyo na vai pancha vayuhu
sections.translation: I am not the breath, nor the five elements,

sections.transliteration: na va sapta dhatur na va pancha koshah
sections.translation: I am not matter, nor the 5 sheaths of consciousness

sections.transliteration: na vak pani-padam na chopastha payu
sections.translation: Nor am I the speech, the hands, or the feet,

sections.transliteration: chidananda rupah shivo'ham shivo'ham
sections.translation: I am the form of consciousness and bliss, I am Shiva

sections.transliteration: na me dvesha ragau na me lobha mohau
sections.translation: There is no like or dislike in me, no greed or delusion,

sections.transliteration: na me vai mado naiva matsarya bhavaha
sections.translation: I know not pride or jealousy,

sections.transliteration: na dharmo na chartho na kamo na mokshaha
sections.translation: I have no duty, no desire for wealth, lust or liberation,

sections.transliteration: chidananda rupah shivo'ham shivo'ham
sections.translation: I am the form of consciousness and bliss, I am Shiva

sections.transliteration: na punyam na papam na saukhyam na duhkham
sections.translation: No virtue or vice, no pleasure or pain,

sections.transliteration: na mantro na tirtham na veda na yajnah
sections.translation: I need no mantras, no pilgrimage, no scriptures or rituals,

sections.transliteration: aham bhojanam naiva bhojyam na bhokta
sections.translation: I am not the experienced, nor the experience itself,

sections.transliteration: chidananda rupah shivo'ham shivo'ham
sections.translation: I am the form of consciousness and bliss, I am Shiva

sections.transliteration: na me mrtyu shanka na mejati bhedaha
sections.translation: I have no fear of death, no caste or creed,

sections.transliteration: pita naiva me naiva mataa na janmaha
sections.translation: I have no father, no mother, for I was never born,

sections.transliteration: na bandhur na mitram gurur naiva shishyaha
sections.translation: I am not a relative, nor a friend, nor a teacher nor a student,

sections.transliteration: chidananda rupah shivo'ham shivo'ham
sections.translation: I am the form of consciousness and bliss, I am Shiva

sections.transliteration: aham nirvikalpo nirakara rupo
sections.translation: I am devoid of duality, my form is formlessness,

sections.transliteration: vibhut vatcha sarvatra sarvendriyanam
sections.translation: I exist everywhere, pervading all senses,

sections.transliteration: na cha sangatham naiva muktir na meyaha
sections.translation: I am neither attached, neither free nor captive,

sections.transliteration: chidananda rupah shivo'ham shivo'ham
sections.translation: I am the form of consciousness and bliss, I am Shiva
